name: phonebook_backend
description: The backend to phonebook tutorial project

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Joe Vonama
